title: I Use Skincare For My Mental Health | Vi Lai
description: Vi Lai, otherwise known on Instagram and TikTok handles as @whatsonvisface, is a social media and beauty influencer. She has a huge following and practically blew up overnight. Originally, our conversation was supposed to be about skincare and recommendations, but took a deep dive into the good that social media influencers can do for the world as well as navigating overnight fame.
